remarks: Move proper substitution in and out of a membership relation.  Note that the scope of ` [. A / x ]. ` is the wff ` B e. C ` , whereas the scope of ` [_ A / x ]_ ` is the class ` B ` .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)
statement:
sbcel1g $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. B e. C <-> [_ A / x ]_ B e. C ) ) $.
$d C x $.
